summary:
Int. Sales & Brand Management 
Enthusiastic, well networked with a positive approach to achieving good international business relationships. My strengths are within brand management, brand activation, communications, PR, media relations, corporate positioning, product launches, advertising, sales collateral and tradeshow marketing. I love creating new creative, innovate, and out-of-the-box approaches in applying the company's message. 

In my spare time I am an active member of LIONSCLUB Amsterdam 't IJ. By being a volunteer, I love everyone to see a better tomorrow. Being able to say 'I changed something in the world, in the lives of others', gives meaning to my being here. Beyond simply looking after myself, my family friends and personal Family & Lifestyle blog olivette.nl.

awards.title: Lion of the year Award 2013-2014

profile_positions.description:
We are an international group of passionate employees who focus on developing safe, easy-to-use and stylish solutions for active families and outdoor enthusiasts. We help them bring what they care most about when they are living an active life.
Whether you're in the city or the great outdoors. For our own health and happiness as human beings, and ultimately for the respect and care we then give to the world around us.
#BringYourLife
profile_positions.title: Pr Manager Netherlands, Belgium & France

profile_positions.description:
Difrax is a fast growing A-Brand and synonymous with baby and kids items. We are the market leader in the Netherlands and distributed in more than 28 European countries. Famous for its award-winning products and conquering Europe, Australia, Malaysia & China. Difrax is leading in product innovation combined with Dutch Design. 

We want to stand out with striking trendy, innovative & cheerful baby products. We have a deep-seated passion to distinguish ourselves with just that little bit extra. Always to make the lives of babies & parents as easy and pleasant as possible! We develop products for fashionable parents & happy kids!

International Marketing & Communications
I am responsible for the international marketing activities in France & Germany. Our marketing team work closely with the International Sales and product development department, in order to quickly and successfully anticipate new market opportunities. 

Responsibilities and tasks:
•	Build and maintain the international Difrax brand with our business partners & consumers
•	Help define the communication & marketing strategy for the focus countries & responsible for its implementation. Managing plans to maximize our ROI on marketing projects. 
•	Develop and execute internal and external communications. 
•	Work close with our partners & consumers to drive co-marketing activities.
•	Brief our distributors & communication partners like PR & Marketing agencies.
•	Create a pro-active social media presence on Twitter, FB & other relevant sites. Actively participate in discussions across communities and social networks.
•	Manage event calendar, POS materials, photographers & organize international events.
profile_positions.title: Marketing & Communications Manager Difrax

profile_positions.description:
Lionsclub Amsterdam 't IJ meet the needs of local communities in Amsterdam. We are a young and active volunteer club and active on social media like twitter, facebook and our own website.
Lionsclub international has 1.36 million members - who perform community service in 210 countries and geographic areas - are different in many ways, but share a core belief: community is what we make it. When you join Lions, you join a global service network. So, at the same time you're doing local community service, you can also contribute to Lions volunteer efforts around the world.

With 5 other enthusiastic Lions we created this Lions club in 2009. In 2014 we officially chartered with 22 members and we are still growing and doing great projects. 

Learn more about Lionsclub Amsterdam 't IJ online - our history, mission and community service work.
Website	  www.lionsclubamsterdamhetij.nl
Twitter	  @lionsamsterdam
Facebook   http://www.facebook.com/lionsclubamsterdamhetij
Youtube      https://www.youtube.com/user/LionsclubAmsterdam
profile_positions.title: Pr and Communications officer Lionsclub Amsterdam 't IJ - Volunteer

profile_positions.description:
My role as Pr & Communications Officer in the District 110AN takes me currently 20-30 hours per week. When all content is placed and the platform have been built, it will take approximately 10-15 hours a week. The role as PR & Communications officer covers a wide range of duties;

* Media liaison and relationship development within the Lions district.
* Social Media (including Facebook Twitter Youtube management), production of media releases, implementing PR & communication ideas like the Dutch Television/Music campaign, researching stories and statistics, providing PR & Communications support to all levels of the District and Lions organization, prioritizing projects like the Young ambassador award, Peace Poster contest, helping Leo club Haarlem i.o with their public relations, report writing, writing magazine articles where required, developing forward plans.

Website	        www.lionsclubs110an.nl	
Twitter	        @lionsclub110AN	
Facebook	https://www.facebook.com/lionsclubdistrict110AN?ref=hl
profile_positions.title: Pr & Communications Counselor District 110AN

profile_positions.description:
Intraco Trading is a supplier for promotional gadgets. 
For now 20 years, we have been introducing on the market unique promotional products. Thanks to our portfolio of brands, we provide a comprehensive range of modern, innovative and useful devices. 
The D-vice brand covers a complete product line of novelties in the area of phoning, computing and outdoor gadgets. USB-premiums is an extensive range of USB Flashdrives, MP3 and MP4. 

Intraco Trading also distribute products from Philips and Xoopar which stands out in term of design and functionality. The products are designed to make your life easier and to support you in making the step ahead.Intraco Trading is proven to be a real international player. With offices in Europe and in the Far East, we employ about 70 persons. The head quarter is based in The Netherlands, near Amsterdam with representative in Germany, Spain, France, Scandinavia and in the UK.There are also have offices in China and HongKong. Since 2005, Intraco Trading became a member of the New Wave Group.

www.intraco.nl
www.d-vice.info
www.usb-premiums.com
www.stickydrive.nl/

Responsibilities
* Account Responsible French Market: LU, FR, BE (fr) Client communications, conflict resolution, and compliance on client deliverables and revenue.
* Review of all major deliverables (tech spec, etc.) to ensure quality standards and client expectations are met,
* Ensure that client issues are dealt with in an efficient manner, informing the Managing Director of any problems that may arise,
* Aware and in pursuit of opportunities for account growth and new business. Regular Sales visits Key-Accounts
* Weekly Reports to the Account Director, providing regular input on all account activity, including status and sales reports. 

I am a Motivated and goal oriented woman who has a high level of initiative and sense of responsibility. I work well on my own and in a team environment.
profile_positions.title: International Key Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
* Selling of superior fashion items import/export Europe and Asia.
* We focused on innovation, introduction of new products, increasing of efficiency and productivity within the team and company. B2C and B2B
* Operated the business on a day to day basis Overseeing details and babying the company into success
* Find and research new business opportunities: Events, shop locations, recruiting new personel to join the team
* Making improvements in the current market segment and seeing opportunities to meet our customer needs
* Follow through and begin the new business. This involved marketing, financial, recruting and coaching skills
* Get the funding to launch Schitterendt

I am a Positive individual. Pragmatic about the hurdles we faced and the work it was going to take to vault over them. I have a high urge for achievement and able to deal with a great amount of stress. Moreover a positive attitude and able to gauge the risks involved in being an entrepeneur

http://www.deleukstewinkelvandestad.nl/apeldoorn/schitterendt/
profile_positions.title: Owner-Management Account manager

profile_positions.description:
Entrepreneurial venture, buying and selling of superior jewelery and fashion items at national and international fairs. Coordinated correspondence and relations with foreign and local wholesalers, clients and end-users
B2C-B2B

Example some yearly events:
www.marienwaerdt.nl/
www.countrychristmasfair.nl/
www.castlefair.nl/
www.amisdefrance.nl/
www.pinksterfair.nl/
www.italieevenement.nl/splash.html

Skills, Responsibilities
Passionate and risk taking. After finishing my management degree in Macau and defending my thesis in Amsterdam, I joined the company Riksja. We became partners with the devotion to make it a big success. Our determination to succeed was due to our strong will. Setbacks and risks did not discourage us and we were relentless in our pursuit of goals. We were absolutely attracted to challenges and to approach risks cautiously. Common sense prevails and this made us cautious around the tough bends. 
We were very passionate about our succesfull venture, our sheer belief and conviction in the idea or action helped us survive and grow. The great team we worked with made us love our hard working and commitment. We worked long hours, were never afraid to get our hands dirty and always focussed on our task with a high degree of involvement. This brought us to the big success of Riksja.
